entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
